title: It's not easy
creator_credit: Judy Rymer, Sandra Alexander, Film Australia and Inland Films
brief_description: Made in association with the Family Court of Australia, this program looks at the effect on children of broken marriages, and the way that the Family Courts can counsel parents. Three case studies illustrate different problems and how they can be solved.
creator_credit_for_label: Judy Rymer, Sandra Alexander, Film Australia and Inland Films
